7.2 The Transcendentals module

sin

G.f. method

Summary

Returns the sine of its argument.

Signature

sin x => y

Arguments

x
An instance of type <real>. The angle, in radians.

Values

y
An instance of type <float>.

Library

common-extensions

Module

transcendentals

Description

Returns the sine of its argument. The floating point precision of the result is given by the precision of x. The result is a single-float if x is an integer.

See also

See the functions cos, page 173 and tan, page 180.

Common Dylan and Functional Extensions - 31 Mar 00
